name: Haunted House (itch) (Silent Thieves Studio)
description:
Swat team arrives in the car to abandoned mansion at night at middle of nowhere to investigate mystery behind killing FBI agents investigating the mansion. Four team enter a mansion and start searching the mansion for evidence

created by - Lukas Tomasek & Ahmed Mohamed

2. open the folder

3. open  file called - "Haunted Mansion.exe"
